long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Leadly is a powerful lead generation tool designed to help businesses find accurate email addresses and detailed contact information for LinkedIn connections. It offers features such as bulk contact extraction, an AI assistant for defining the Ideal Customer Profile (ICP), and data enrichment with over 10 data points per contact. Users can automate data extraction from LinkedIn and Sales Navigator, ensuring up-to-date and verified information for effective outreach. Leadly provides various subscription plans, including a free forever plan with basic credits and unlimited AI usage.
